episodes.title: Why I Left Scientology - The Joy Villa Show Ep 42
episodes.description:
Preorder my BOOK Here: https://a.co/d/4fULJbY 🎙️ The Joy Villa Show – Episode 42
💥 Why I Left Scientology – My Raw, Real, and Redeemed Story

For the first time EVER, I’m telling the full truth. No filters. No fear. Just my heart. 💔➡️❤️

I was deep in it—15 years in Scientology. A celebrity. A believer. A “minister.” But behind the success and smiling photos was a soul slowly dying.

🕳️ THE DARKNESS I DIDN’T SEE:
I gave them everything. My money, my time, my identity…even my soul.
And yet, I was still empty, broken, and lost—until JESUS found me in the middle of my pain.

✨ FROM CULT TO CHRIST:
This is my escape story. From manipulation, witchcraft, and control…
To FREEDOM, deliverance, and the powerful love of Jesus.

💣 I’m exposing it all.
The occult roots, the false promises, the high-pressure tactics, and how I finally broke free. This isn’t just for me—this is for YOU.

🔥 IN THIS EPISODE:

How I got into Scientology

What really happens behind closed doors

The cost of leaving a global cult

My spiritual breakdown—and Jesus breakthrough

My message to anyone trapped in deception

📢 WATCH THIS WITH AN OPEN HEART.
Subscribe, comment, and SHARE with someone who needs the truth.

#TheJoyVillaShow #WhyILeftScientology #FromCultsToChrist #ExposingScientology #FaithOverFear #SpiritualWarfare #JesusSav
